medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Began 2 weeks ago after a yoga class, with accompanying 7 lbs weight loss, nausea, and general malaise. Denies decreased appetite, continues to pass flatus and have regular bowel movements. Symptoms have not included fever, headache, diarrhea, vomiting, hematochezia, hematuria, or increased urinary frequency/urgency.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, left-sided diverticulitis, incidentally found IgM monoclonal gammopathy, nasal polyps.
medical_history.family_history: Father died with heart problems, mother had a history of breast cancer, sister has pemphigus.
